requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel HD 520
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-4440 3,10 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any distribution
  • Processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64) processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 series GPU or AMD Radeon HD 7000 series
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you can run a supported operating system then you can probably run this game

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64) processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 series GPU or AMD Radeon HD 7000 series
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you can run a supported operating system then you can probably run this game

Recommended:

results.name: Shooting Star - The show must go on!
